title: Update problem/bug
body:
When i startup my launcher and wait for it to update, there suddenly pops up a message "_Update Failed_"  -  _Unspecified error occurred. Check the logs for more information._
What should I do ?

replies.body:
Patching issues can be caused by a plethora of factors, but the most frequent are permissions problems or connection issues to the server. We've gathered the most common fixes in our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), so I definitely recommend working through it.

Let me know if those steps resolve this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AqKGikUh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-25T23:43:06.881+0000)
>
> Patching issues can be caused by a plethora of factors, but the most frequent are permissions problems or connection issues to the server. We've gathered the most common fixes in our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), so I definitely recommend working through it.
> 
> Let me know if those steps resolve this issue.

Will try, thanks for the heads up !
